channel.title: Priest + Soulcatcher reworked and put back into the game
channel.description:
Priest (Social Blue Dragon) [details="Summary"] Passive: Old spirit, You will gain the passive of the class you used at night it will fade after that night (This wouldn't effect royal blood due to it only lasting that night, and that's stupid) Day Ability: Last thoughts, Learn the last results of a dead player the next night, doesn't learn anything to do with how they died. (2 uses) Night Ability: Deads blessing, use the power of a dead blue dragon member, you cannot use this on the same dead person, cannot be unique, you cannot use direct killing abilities. Night Ability(2): Holy Barrier, Make someone Immune to conversion, framing and occupation (2 uses) [/details]
Soulcatcher (Social Unseen)
[details="Summary"] Passive: Old spirit, You will gain the passive of the class you used at night it will fade after that night (This wouldn't effect royal blood due to it only lasting that night, and that's stupid) Day Ability: Last thoughts, Learn the last results of a dead player the next night, doesn't learn anything to do with how they died. (2 uses) Day Ability: Last thoughts, Learn the last results of a dead player the next night (2 uses) Night Ability: Deads blessing, use the power of a dead blue dragon/Unseen member but it will be the converted version of that ability, You cannot use assassin/Masterminds ability, cannot use direct killing ability's Night Ability(2): Capture Soul, target someone if attacked they will show up as alive for the next day (2 uses) (Basically Reap) [/details]

item.source: Priest + Soulcatcher reworked and put back into the game

item.title: Priest + Soulcatcher reworked and put back into the game
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
Also Auto confirm-ability isn’t going to be a thing, Cannot use Unique classes (Like Mystic for that exact reason), I’ll have to look into everything a little more.

Also yeah the second ability isn’t social on priest if anyone wants to come up with a good idea for the second ability that sounds good, but remember classes can do things outside there class type aka chronomancer being a support that can kill

Read full topic
item.source: Priest + Soulcatcher reworked and put back into the game

item.title: Priest + Soulcatcher reworked and put back into the game
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
Changes Made:

New Passive (removed the old one)

Passive: Old spirit, You will gain the passive of the class you used at night it will fade after that night (This wouldn’t effect royal blood due to it only lasting that night, and that’s stupid, with Knight you will survive first defend just like them)

This removes anything to do with there death, aka poss jump, killed to posions ect, and will only figure out there last results, aka sheriff finding someone as unseen or physician healing someone.

Day Ability: Last thoughts, Learn the last results of a dead player the next night, doesn’t learn anything to do with how they died. (2 uses)

Also Priest/Soulcatcher cannot use direct killing abilities but can use Defend, because it’s not direct.

Read full topic

item.title: Priest + Soulcatcher reworked and put back into the game
item.dc:creator: Luxy
item.description:
I like the idea, however, maybe make it so it takes weaker versions of dead abilities so it isn’t too OP.

E.g If a phys is dead he can heal bleed/poison but not attacks.

Read full topic
item.source: Priest + Soulcatcher reworked and put back into the game

item.title: Priest + Soulcatcher reworked and put back into the game
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
Soulshade55r:

Passive: Holy blessing, Immune to occupation or framing once.

Eh. Doesn’t need occ immunity. I’d just remove this altogether.

Soulshade55r:

Day Ability: Last thoughts, Learn the last results of a dead player the next night (2 uses)

Unsure how this interacts with poss jump. If it works like it should (it doesn’t catch jump), this is balanced.

Soulshade55r:

Night Ability: Deads blessing, use the power of a dead blue dragon member, you cannot use this on the same dead person, cannot be unique.

Seems good. I just wonder if this makes the class too confirmable (i.e use dead mystic to talk to prince/king), or use dead hunter to wolf a guy.

I also have questions with how this interacts with defile and poss jump.

Soulshade55r:

Night Ability(2): Holy Barrier, Make someone Immune to conversion, framing and occupation (2 uses)

This doesn’t belong on a social class. This ability is distinctly CW.

Soulshade55r:

Passive: Dark Curse, once converted the first unseen member to be investigated will appear Not Suspicous [If two members are investigated Mastermind gets 1st priority, Soulcathcer 2nd and assassin 3rd]

This kind of ability (where it doesn’t have a skill basis, it just auto activates) is inherently poor design. Make this a day ability to make a target unseen not suspicious to investigative results.

Soulshade55r:

Day Ability: Last thoughts, Learn the last results of a dead player the next night (2 uses)

See my response to the BD last thoughts.

Soulshade55r:

Night Ability: Deads blessing, use the power of a dead blue dragon/Unseen member but it will be the converted version of that ability, You cannot use assassin/Masterminds abilitys.

Seems good.

Soulshade55r:

Night Ability(2): Capture Soul, target someone if attacked they will show up as alive for the next day (2 uses) (Basically Reap)

Seems good.

All in all, this class on the unseen end seems entirely fair (with a few tweaks).

However, the BD version is a cause for concern, specifically because of the potential of the auto-confirm depending on which classes die. It also has abilities a social class should not have.

Read full topic
